Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção

Examples: level=error msg="[linters_context] typechecking error: : # github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/internal/config [github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/internal/config.test]\ninternal\\config\\tls_test.go:14:7: initialization cycle: invalidValue refers to itself"
test\component\task_service_test.go:396:31: SA1029: should not use built-in type string as key for value; define your own type to avoid collisions (staticcheck)
internal\handlers\health.go:53:54: unused-parameter: parameter 'r' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
internal\slo\alerting.go:230:1: cyclomatic complexity 21 of func `(*AlertManager).shouldSilence` is high (> 18) (gocyclo)
